ygData.subject: RE: testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
ygData.msgSnippet: My shaman friend likes to toss the talismans on his pet. I imagine he won t be too happy... I guess the only pet that will take an HP buff is the Mistwalker
ygData.messageBody:
My shaman friend likes to toss the talismans on his pet. I imagine he won't
be too happy... I guess the only pet that will take an HP buff is the
Mistwalker wolf...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
8)Sent: Sunday, September 26, 1999 3:10 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
8)
8)
8)From: jhenders@...
8)
8)
8)Neither str or haze is a hp buff though so it's unlikely to
8)affect you.
8)In fact, I can't think of one pet using class who gets a hp
8)buff. So it
8)more effects groups than soloers. At least, on the servers I play on I
8)don't see a lot of activity on the auction channel with magicians and
8)enchanters begging for resolution on their pets the way ppl
8)beg for sow.
8)
